price: 97. Et dis : « Seigneur, je cherche refuge auprès de Toi contre les suggestions des démons.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
